sourcesContent:
import { useRoute } from '@react-navigation/native'
import axios from 'axios'
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, Image, ImageBackground } from 'react-native'

export default function DetalhesDosProdutos({navigation}){
    const [produto, setProduto] = useState([])
    const route = useRoute()
    const id = route.params.id
    
    useEffect(() => {
        axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/loja/produtos/${id}/`)
        .then((res) => {
            let a = []
            a.push(res.data)
            setProduto(a)
        })
    }, [])
    return(
        <View style={{width: '100%', height: '100%', backgroundColor: 'white'}}>
           <ImageBackground style={{width: '100%', height: 450, marginTop: -20}} source={require('../assets/rectangle 52.svg')}>
                <View style={{width: '60%', height: 120, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row-reverse', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center'}}>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center'}}>Brócolis</Text>
                    <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Home')}> 
                        <Image style={{width: 60, height: 60}} source={require('../assets/botão voltar.svg')}></Image>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
                
                <View style={{height: 300, justifyContent: 'flex-end'}}>
                    <View style={{backgroundColor: '#5F5DEE', width: 100, marginBottom: 20, marginLeft: 'auto', borderBottomLeftRadius: 10, borderTopLeftRadius: 10}}>
                        <Text style={{padding: 10, fontSize: 20, fontWeight: 'bold', color: 'white'}}>R$ 3,00</Text>
                    </View>
                </View>
               
           </ImageBackground>

           <View style={{width: '100%', alignItems: 'center', height: 200}}>
                <Text style={{textAlign: 'center', alignItems: 'center', width: 328, fontSize: 16}}>Descrição do produto bla bla bla bla bla bla blaaaa bla bla blaaa blaa bla blaaa bla blaaaaa.</Text>
           </View>

           <View style={{width: '100%', height: 10, borderTopWidth: 2, borderColor: '#E0E0E0'}}></View>

           <View style={{width: '100%', height: 50}}>
                <Text style={{width: 100, fontSize: 16, fontWeight: 'bold', marginLeft: 'auto'}}>Total: 00,00</Text>
           </View>

           <View style={{width: '100%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-evenly', flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center'}}>
                <View style={{display: 'flex', width: 150, flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-evenly'}}>
                    <Image source={require('../assets/icone_mais.png')} style={{width: 32, height: 32, borderRadius: 50, backgroundColor: '#5F5DEE'}}></Image>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 'bold'}}>0</Text>
                    <Image source={require('../assets/icone_menos.png')} style={{width: 32, height: 32, borderRadius: 50, backgroundColor: '#5F5DEE'}}></Image>

                </View>
                <TouchableOpacity style={{borderRadius: 4, backgroundColor: '#5F5DEE', width: 212, justifyContent: 'center', height: 50}}>
                    <Text style={{fontSize: 16, color: 'white', textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Adicionar ao carrinho</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
           </View>
            
        </View>
    )
}
